Author: __peewee
Text: I don’t know this guy but one way you could look at it is, he had sex with you because he was more comfortable around you and knew you liked him so if the sex was bad you would still be his friend.. if that makes sense??   Maybe he is afraid of making the wrong move on this guy who he isn’t as comfortable with. Either way though he is still an ass for leading you on and making you feel so down.   Sometimes ppl are shitty, you can’t give them the power of letting their actions emotionally affect your life. Your self worth is worth more than 1 attractive guy.
